column4: hello everyone, i was wondering if there was any way to prevent the execution/opening of a specific file extension on ubuntu under a limited user account, is there any?
hello everyone, i was wondering if there was any way to prevent the execution/opening of a specific file extension on ubuntu under a limited user account, is there any?
proberly not. they could always drag/drop it onto some app and load it that way
uh uh i gotta find another way lol , thank you very much for your answer :)
